ru.text: Tаити, Tаити… Не были мы ни в какой Таити! Нас и здесь неплохо кормят.
ru.author: Возвращение блудного попугая

en.text: Tahiti! Tahiti! We have never been on Tahiti. We are well fed here!
en.author: Return of the prodigal parrot

ru.text: Я тучка, тучка, тучка, я вовсе не медведь.
ru.author: Винни-Пух и все-все-все

en.text: I'm a little cloud, a little cloud, a little cloud, I'm not at all a bear.
en.author: Winnie-The-Pooh and All, All, All

en.text: It looks like it's going to rain...
en.author: Winnie-The-Pooh and All, All, All

en.text: Well, you... Drop in on if you need anything else!
en.author: There once was a dog

en.text: He flew away, but he promised to come back...
en.author: Junior and Karlson

en.text: Leopold, come out! You are a sneaky coward!
en.author: Adventures of Cat Leopold

ru.text: Усы, лапы и хвост — вот мои документы!
ru.author: Трое из Простоквашино

en.text: Whiskers, paws and tail, these are my documents!
en.author: Three from Prostokvashino

en.text: I congratulate you, Sharik, you are a booby.
en.author: Three from Prostokvashino
